Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: Bill Larson
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use as a desktop computer that I can occasionally take with me. I must say, I'm very impressed. I have an external monitor and mouse hooked up to it. Having two monitors is great, but I find myself using the laptop monitor a lot due to the touchscreen. Windows 8 is really worthless without a touchscreen monitor. I've been gaming with it and it has handled everything I throw at it wonderfully. I use external speakers, so the tiny laptop speakers that it comes with hasn't been an issue. They're good for a portable device, but not for playing music in your home at loud volumes. All things considered, I couldn't be happier with this machine. Add in that I got Amazon Prime shipping and it's a gem!

Reviews.Title: Great laptop for the money
Reviews.Author: Clawhandle1
Reviews.Content: This unit performs as I expected. The battery life is incredible and makes this laptop one of the most efficient ones that I have ever owned. I feel I got my money's worth with this unit. My only complaint is that while sitting it next to a friends macbook, I noticed that the colors on the mac display were much more realistic that this unit. However, since this was less costly than a mac, I feel I got good value for the money

Reviews.Title: Value
Reviews.Author: AK
Reviews.Content: Great price for a gr8 product. Couldn't find a better alternative for a gaming laptop. Could have done with a ssd instead of a hybrid

Reviews.Title: Great touch laptop!
Reviews.Author: Laura Espinosa
Reviews.Content: I ordered this laptop for my husband and it has worked very well for him! It looks nice, works well, and has some fun features like a touchscreen and fingerprint sensor. My husband's only complaint is that the touchscreen doesn't always work perfectly and the screen doesn't look as clear as a non-touch screen.
